abstract: When we truly learn the secrets of the Flexbox layout mode, we can build absolutely incredible things. Fluid layouts that stretch and shrink without arbitrary breakpoints. In this action-packed interactive tutorial, we'll pop the hood on the Flexbox algorithm and learn how to do remarkable things with it. ✨
title: An Interactive Guide to Flexbox

abstract:
Today we are checking out Scatter, a powerful add-on for the Godot Game Engine that will make your level editing a heck of a lot easier!  Scatter makes it trivial to create paths, roads, grass, forests, etc in your Godot game. 
 
Links:
https://gamefromscratch.com/scatter-f...
title: Scatter -- A Must Have Tool For Godot Level Editors!
Arnklit/ShellFurGodot: Add-on that adds a fur node to the Godot engine, using a shell based approach to imitate fur strands.

Download the Project here: https://github.com/chafmere/Building-...

The Theory behind this video is based of the GDC Talk building a better jump by Kyle Pitman in which some real technical math is given as a way to calculate a perfect jump. In this video I have tried to implement this theory in the Godot Game Engine.

This is an update to a video from a few years ago. But Godot 4.

Support the Channel:   / chaffgames  

Join The Discord:   / discord  

Get the FPS PRO Template: https://chafmere.itch.io/godot-4-fps-pro
